title: Ekko?
body: Ekko login screen but no Ekko in the shop? Any idea's?

replies.body: We accidentally enabled Ekko before the patch that actually had the content was deployed. We are working on enabling him now and you should see him available in the store shortly. Sorry for any inconvenience and confusion this may have caused.
Hey so I bought Ekko, haven't yet played him because the past two times I've tried (in customs) it's either frozen him in midlane or the login music will still be playing even in game?
Yeah, NA always gets new stuff first with OCE following by a day or two. Not sure about the other servers, I only have accounts on NA and OCE.
The patch notes say that he'll be available "a little later this patch". I'd guesstimate that he'll be available sometime in the next 48 hours.
But NA already have him, we've got his login screen which usually means the champ should be available but he isnt in the shop. :(
Buts hes been released on all other servers currently
Yeah, I logged on to get him as hes currently available on all other servers, yet not oce...
